TopicTitle: Where can I find a mod that adds a "seat" for rovers?

Articles.Content: I've seen pics of people that have driver seats in their rovers and I thought it would be way cool to have one in mine but I can't find a link to it.
I've used this mod by bobcat, it has a seat as a command pod and looks pretty cool. If you just want the seat than only install that part folder - http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/demv-mark-3-ex-2/

Yup. That seat comes with a built in decoupler and parachute as well. So I had to stick one on top of an SRB and let Jeb take it for a ride.

There is at least one other seat like this, though I don't know where it is. There's also one non-functional seat that someone uploaded as a preview, but if anything came of that, I haven't heard about it.
